entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
